lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and want to help bless those who only need a chance and a little hope, to build a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large Healthcare technology firm. I help my company create better services/products, and improve healthcare for millions of people.

lenders.name: Kip
lenders.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit, and I want to do what I can to encourage it in others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a success coach.  I meet with my clients weekly and hold them accountable for the commitments they make to succeed in their own businesses and balance their lives.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: it's a gift to share the blessings I've been given with others
lenders.occupational_info: For over 20 years I have had my own business helping families & individuals sell & buy homes and investment properties.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of a movement for positive change! Our actions create ripples across time and space that we can scarcely imagine.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Who else will?
lenders.occupational_info: High school student currently.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: in the words of philosopher William James, "The community stagnates without the impulse of the individual. The impulse dies away without the sympathy of the community. "

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: it is rewarding to look at other people's life and see that you were able to make a difference. Be a doer and not a talker!
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate investments.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I thought it would be a nice thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make machines that make paper.

lenders.name: Charles Lough
lenders.loan_because: People helping people helping themselves.

lenders.name: Katie

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I am rich and have money.

I take care of the poor at a public hospital, especially those with HIV.
I also do research to find better ways to make people healthy.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way for individuals to be investors AND caring human beings at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting people with disabilities to gain the most experience and enjoyment of life.

lenders.name: Martin & Ragnhild
lenders.loan_because: Opportunities in life are being very unfairly distributed over the world. Micro credit gives people opportunities that wouldn't have been there otherwise.

lenders.name: Scott and Amy
lenders.loan_because: We agree with a smart man who has said that "intelligence, ability and dreams are evenly distributed across all of humanity...but resources and opportunity are not."  This is a small way in which we can help that opportunity become more evenly distributed.
lenders.occupational_info: "You make a living by what you get...you make a life by what you give."

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out others . This way I know exactly where my money ends up. I realy like this system.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find jobs.

lenders.name: Jade
lenders.loan_because: I think that there couldn't be a better gift than provide jobs and business to countries where they need this most.

lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs and small business leaders reach the next levels of success in their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy my work. This is a great job! Making couples dreams come through.

lenders.name: Grazyna

lenders.name: Zooky
lenders.loan_because:
I see so many people here with good ideas and creativity to create opportunities for themselves and the people around them. The only thing they need to forfill their plans is money.

Money is not spread equally. For $ 25,- I can buy food for only a few days, but in other parts of the world this money is worth a lot more!

It's the idea that a relatively little investment form my side can make a lot of difference for somebody else.

What I like is: after the money is payed back it can be invested again in another great idea.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a  copywriter I create texts for advertisements, promotional brochures or other public relations outlets such as websites.

Besides that I play guitar and djembe (percussion)

lenders.occupational_info: At this moment I am changing my direction. I have been office manager/secretary for many years, but in my heart I want to be a writer and journalist. I am changing my occupation now. I work for a local newspaper and I also write about mental health issues.

Retired now.

I suggest many more people will enjoy KIVA to make it more successful

lenders.name: Jolien

lenders.name: Jill & Erik

lenders.name: Vince and Anna
lenders.loan_because: This is how we know what love is: Jesus Christ laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers. If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth. This then is how we know that we belong to the truth, and how we set our hearts at rest in his presence whenever our hearts condemn us. For God is greater than our hearts, and he knows everything.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because:
I know how transformative it is to have someone believe in and support your efforts to do something new, beyond what you've done before. I want to do that for someone else.
   FROM HER FATHER: My daughter Terry passed away 30 July 2009 from a very aggressive metastatic cancer after being ill for less than one month.  I will continue her wish to help others by continuing to make loans thru Kiva.

By lending financial assistance to woman in business, We can do that. Peace
